Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that Rhode Island doesn't have to pay federal income taxes based on the fact that it didn't ratify the 13th Amendment.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rhode Island did ratify the 13th Amendment.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that not ratifying the 13th Amendment means Rhode Island doesn't have to pay federal income taxes.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to justify the conclusion that Rhode Island doesn't have to pay federal income taxes.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the 16th Amendment, not the 13th, is the amendment that created the federal income tax, and Rhode Island did reject the 16th Amendment.
